Docs.param: The name of the blob container within the specified storage account. Blob container names must be between 3 and 63 characters in length and use numbers, lower-case letters and dash (-) only. Every dash (-) character must be immediately preceded and followed by a letter or number.
Properties of the blob container to create.
Waits for the completion of the long running operations.
The cancellation token to use.
Docs.summary: Creates a new container under the specified account as described by request body. The container resource includes metadata and properties for that container. It does not include a list of the blobs contained by the container.

Optional. When specified, only container names starting with the filter will be listed.
